name: World's Cry
desc:
You unleash a small portion of the world's pain upon a 15 foot cube adjacent to you. Creatures
inside must make an Intuition saving throw or take 2d10 damage. This damage has no type and
cannot be reduced or negated in any way.
empower:
Damage increased to 3d10. If the creature is vulnerable to a damage type, they are
vulnerable to damage from this spell.
